snippet: Energy industry companies were hurt, with shares of Transocean falling 5 percent.
abstract: Stocks are serene with slight gains, as investors wait for Federal Reserve's decision on interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Energy industry companies were hurt, with shares of Transocean falling 5 percent.

headline.main: Modest Gain for the Market as Oil Prices Slump Again
headline.print_headline: Quiet Day as Traders Await Fed, Helping Wall St. Hold Week’s Gains
